content.title: National Technology Awards
content.beneficiary: Organizations and individuals involved in technological innovation
content.details: The National Technology Day, celebrated annually on May 11th, commemorates India's significant milestones in technological advancement. The National Technology Awards are presented on this day to recognize and encourage contributions in the commercialization and development of indigenous technologies across various categories.
benefits: National Technology Award (Main): ₹25,00,000/- and a trophy.
National Technology Awards (Translational Research): ₹5,00,000/- and a trophy.
eligibility: Only private and Public limited companies Registered under companies Act 1956/2013 at Registrar of Companies (ROC) may apply.
Under technology startup category, only startup with DPIIT registration to be considered eligible.
Women-led enterprise as per Government of India norms.

For National Technology Award (Translational Research): Regular position in Indian Institute of repute, Patents / Technology transfer / Licensed to Indian Industry, Technology commercialized by the Industry partner and Earning revenue, Socio-economic Impact of the Innovation.
For National Technology Awards (Technology Business Incubators): TBI- Application are invited from Indian organizations/ Institutions actively involved in nurturing technology-based startups.
content.application_process: Visit the official website, register, and then apply through the online application form.
documents_required: Organizations/ Institutions documents (e.g. annual reports, financial statements)

faqs.question: What are the National Technology Awards?
faqs.answer: The National Technology Awards are an annual event that recognizes and celebrates technological innovation and excellence across various industries within a country.

faqs.question: In which categories are honored under National Technology Award?
faqs.answer: There are 5 categories: National Technology Award (Main), National Technology Awards (MSME), National Technology Awards (Start-up), National Technology Awards (Translational Research), National Technology Awards (Technology Business Incubator).

faqs.question: How many awards are honored under each category?
faqs.answer: National Technology Award (Main): 1, National Technology Awards (MSME): 3, National Technology Awards (Start-up): 5, National Technology Awards (Translational Research): 2, National Technology Awards (Technology Business Incubator): 1.

faqs.question: What is the selection process?
faqs.answer: The Awards are evaluated by the panel of eminent scientist, technocrats and researchers nominated by DST, GoI.

faqs.question: What benefits are provided under the scheme?
What are the eligibility criteria for the For 'National Technology Award (Main), MSME & Start-up' categories?
faqs.answer: Only private and Public limited companies Registered under companies Act 1956/2013 at Registrar of Companies (ROC) may apply, and women-led enterprises as per Government of India norms.

faqs.question: What is the official URL for registration?
faqs.answer: Follow the below URL Link: https://awards.gov.in/Registration/SignUp
